item.title: CVE-2023-51506|2024-06-27T19:34:45.772Z -- realmag777 -- wpcs%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20currency%20switcher%20professional
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in realmag777 WPCS – WordPress Currency Switcher Professional allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WPCS – WordPress Currency Switcher Professional: from n/a through 1.2.0.
